parsed.title: O Santo Transformado em Brinquedo
parsed.summary: Um misterioso boneco infantil reproduz a pose de um menino mártir do século XV, vendido como brinquedo comum. Como a imagem sagrada atravessou séculos e chegou às prateleiras modernas, permanecendo envolta em silêncio? O caso revela o poder de uma propaganda que se perpetua, da imprensa incunábil ao marketing de brinquedos, sem jamais explicar o elo entre ambos.

scenes.narration: Um menino santo virou brinquedo… e ninguém entende como isso realmente aconteceu.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, dim medieval altar lit by a flickering candle, a small plastic figurine of a child placed among relics, shadows stretching, muted earth tones
scenes.motionDescription: Slow dolly forward toward the figurine, candle flames gently flickering, shadows shifting across the stone walls
scenes.audioDescription: low echoing choir murmurs, distant candle crackle

scenes.narration: Um boneco de plástico reproduz a pose da gravura medieval, vendido como brinquedo infantil.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, cluttered 19th‑century toy stall under a single harsh light, a plastic replica of the child saint displayed on a wooden shelf, dust motes swirling, a tiny sigil flashes briefly on the toy's base, muted sepia tones
scenes.motionDescription: Gentle pan right across the shelf, dust particles drifting through the narrow light beam
scenes.audioDescription: soft creaking of wood, faint market chatter, distant footstep echo

scenes.narration: Esta história continua aqui, nas sombras, aguardando sua curiosidade. The Gap Files.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, black screen with faint glowing text 'The Gap Files.' centered, subtle smoke drifting, low‑key lighting
scenes.motionDescription: Slow fade‑in of the text, then subtle static hold as smoke drifts gently
scenes.audioDescription: deep resonant tone fading into silence

backgroundMusic.prompt: Dark Ambient, Low Drone Synths, Sparse Piano Notes, Tension Strings, Eerie Pads, Subtle Heartbeat Rhythm, Minor Key, well-arranged composition, 70 BPM
